docs.title: Welcome to the SyväAI Knowledge base
docs.text:
Here, you will find the meaning of error codes you may encounter while using SyväAI, usage tips, and more.

You can search for a article in the search bar, or use the links on the left.

docs.title: Error code 5001
docs.text:
This error means that something went wrong when SyväAI was trying to send your question to our servers. Most of the time this isn't your fault, its usually because our servers were temporally shut down for a bit, or restarting. If you got this error after a long period of time, that meas SyväAI took too long to respond and the server timed out.

Other possible causes for this error can include either: A weak or unstable Wi-Fi connection Your router, browser, or firewall blocking SyväAI Temporary issues with your internet service provider (ISP)

docs.title: Error code 5002
docs.text:
This error means that something went wrong when SyväAI was trying to send its response back to your device. Usually this is not your fault, most of the time its a small bug or misconfiguration on our part.

Other possible causes for this error can include either: A weak or unstable Wi-Fi connection Your router, browser, or firewall blocking SyväAI Temporary issues with your internet service provider (ISP) Response from SyväAI came back in a strange format
